title: Hentai Maid Vampire Wants to Lick Lolita Ojousama’s Pantsu - Novel Updates
tags: C*nnilingus   Hikikomori   Loli   Maids   Perverted Protagonist   R-18   R*pe   Vampires
author: 風船のな
description:
Liese Kudlac, a vampire who loves cute girls.

One day, she found a poster about maid recruitment for taking care of elementary school girls’ everyday necessities.

That elementary school girl, Mikami Riri, her appearance is that of a beautiful girl, but her personality is the worst.

Driving out every single maid, not going to school and enjoying a NEET life.

But, she became Liese’s captive.

With only simple ‘love’, Ojousama is lost in her own self.>
